keyword: how many calories is in fried chicken
title: How Many Calories in Fried Chicken?
meta_description: Discover how many calories is in fried chicken per 100g serving, including full nutrition breakdown, protein, fat, carbs, and preparation tweaks for better choices.
h1: How Many Calories in Fried Chicken?
assumptions: Breaded, deep-fried chicken (mixed pieces, bone-in), skin-on, fast-food style; edible portion only.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by recipe, breading, oil used, portion size, and brand. Check labels or apps for specifics.

quick_answer.text: 100g of fried chicken contains about 239 calories, with high protein and fat from frying.

label_note: Values align with standard Nutrition Facts labels for quick reference and comparison.

tweaks.label: Air-fried instead of deep-fried (less oil absorption)

faqs.q: How many calories is in fried chicken per piece?
faqs.a: A typical drumstick (about 75g) has around 180 calories; varies by size and type.

faqs.q: Is fried chicken high in fat?
faqs.a: Yes, about 14g fat per 100g, mostly from oil and skin; saturated fat is 3.7g.

faqs.q: How much protein in fried chicken?
faqs.a: Approximately 18g protein per 100g, making it a good source despite the frying.

faqs.q: Why is sodium high in fried chicken?
faqs.a: Seasonings and breading add ~618mg sodium per 100g; opt for homemade to control it.

faqs.q: Calories in oven-baked vs. fried chicken?
faqs.a: Oven-baked is lower, around 160-200 kcal per 100g, due to less oil.
